SELECT HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH FROM TB_HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY HOTEL_NO DESC)) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) AS ROOM_PRICE FROM TB_HOTEL JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH ORDER BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PATH, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_INTRO FROM TB_HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT TB_SERVICE.SERVICE_NO, SERVICE_NAME FROM TB_HOTEL JOIN TB_SERVICE ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_SERVICE.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_SERVICE_LIST ON TB_SERVICE_LIST.SERVICE_NO = TB_SERVICE.SERVICE_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT TB_ROOM.CHECKIN_TIME, TB_ROOM.CHECKOUT_TIME, ROOM_NUM, ROOM_PRICE, ROOM_IMG, ROOM_NAME, TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO FROM TB_ROOM JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_ROOM_IMG ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM_IMG.ROOM_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ? AND HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND NOT TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO IN( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE SYSDATE BETWEEN TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME AND TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME )

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM(SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO, RESER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, CASE WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 1 THEN '★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 2 THEN '★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 3 THEN '★★★' WHEN REVIEW_SCORE = 4 THEN '★★★★' ELSE '★★★★★' END AS REVIEW_SCORE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_REVIEW ON TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO = TB_REVIEW.RV_RESER_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND CANCEl_YN = 'N' AND TB_ROOM.ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND REVIEW_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON TB_REVIEW.RV_RESER_NO = TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ? AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_PHONE, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_ADDRESS, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, HOTEL_INTRO, HOST_NAME, HOTEL_DEAIL_ADDR FROM TB_HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT SERVICE_NAME FROM TB_SERVICE_LIST JOIN TB_SERVICE ON TB_SERVICE.SERVICE_NO = TB_SERVICE_LIST.SERVICE_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_SERVICE.HOTEL_NO WHERE TB_HOTEL.HOTEl_YN = 'Y' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

UPDATE TB_HOTEL SET HOTEL_NAME = ?, HOTEL_LOCATION = ?, HOTEL_ADDRESS = ?, HOTEL_CATEGORY = ?, HOTEL_INTRO = ?, HOST_NAME = ?, HOTEL_PATH = ?, HOTEL_DEAIL_ADDR = ? WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND HOTEL_YN = 'Y'
DELETE FROM TB_SERVICE WHERE HOTEL_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_SERVICE VALUES( ?, ? )
UPDATE TB_HOTEL SET HOTEL_YN = 'N' WHERE HOTEL_NO = ?
SELECT DISTINCT HOTEL_LOCATION FROM TB_HOTEL WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT DISTINCT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, COUNT(TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH ORDER BY COUNT(TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO) DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM rowcnt FROM( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_NAME, TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, COUNT(TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO), ROW_NUMBER()OVER (PARTITION BY HOTEL_LOCATION ORDER BY COUNT(TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO)DESC) AS RNUM FROM TB_RESERVATION JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO) WHERE RNUM = 1) A) WHERE rowcnt BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT COMMENT_CONTENT, TB_COMMENT.CREATE_DATE, TB_MEMBER.NICKNAME, TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NAME, TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO, TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO FROM TB_COMMENT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON TB_MEMBER.MEM_NO = TB_COMMENT.COMMENT_MEM_NO JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO = TB_COMMENT.CO_RESER_NO JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO = TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO JOIN TB_HOTEL ON TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO JOIN TB_REVIEW ON TB_REVIEW.RV_RESER_NO = TB_RESERVATION.RESER_NO WHERE TB_MEMBER.DELETE_YN = 'Y' AND TB_RESERVATION.CANCEL_YN = 'N' AND TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM(SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM( SELECT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, MIN(ROOM_PRICE) AS ROOM_PRICE FROM TB_HOTEL LEFT JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO LEFT JOIN TB_RESERVATION ON TB_RESERVATION.ROOM_NO = TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND MAX_PEOPLE >= ? AND HOTEL_LOCATION LIKE ? AND NOT TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO IN( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME >= ? AND TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME <= ?) GROUP BY TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO, HOTEL_NAME, HOTEL_LOCATION, HOTEL_CATEGORY, HOTEL_PATH, HOTEL_ENROLLDATE ORDER BY HOTEL_ENROLLDATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO) AS CNTS FROM TB_HOTEL LEFT JOIN TB_ROOM ON TB_ROOM.HOTEL_NO = TB_HOTEL.HOTEL_NO WHERE HOTEL_YN = 'Y' AND ROOM_YN = 'Y' AND MAX_PEOPLE >= ? AND HOTEL_LOCATION LIKE ? AND NOT TB_ROOM.ROOM_NO IN( SELECT ROOM_NO FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE TB_RESERVATION.CHECKIN_TIME >= ? AND TB_RESERVATION.CHECKOUT_TIME <= ?)
